description:
Sometimes, you just have to make a statement for the content.

The Nelk Boys started with what appeared to be a normal night but Stephen Rocco Deleonardis, aka SteveWillDoIt, did what most of us feel like doing every time Kamala opens her mouth, which takes a sledgehammer and destroyed the TV.

NEW: SteveWillDoit (@stevewilldoit) smashes his television after Vice President Kamala Harris accepts the Democratic nomination.

"Kamala will never be my president," he said as he smashed the screen.

Lmao. pic.twitter.com/eSPZ9BzUe1
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Watch: Influencer Destroys TV With Sledgehammer After Kamala Accepts DNC Nomination

description:
In modern times, most companies should be assumed woke until proven innocent. No matter how often companies die on the DEI hill, that never seems to steer people back to sanity. However, it didn’t take much warning from the unwoke mob for Jack Daniels to get a reality check.

Jack Daniels has axed its DEI initiatives after backlash warnings from “anti-woke” activist Robby Starbuck.


Big news: The next company we were set to expose was @JackDaniels_US.

They must have been tipped off by us going through employee LinkedIn pages.

They just preemptively announced that they’ll be making these changes:

• Ending participation in the
title: Jack Daniels Backtracks On Wokeness After Backlash Warnings

description:
Edmond Public Schools believes it’s perfectly alright for students to lick feet and other body parts, including armpits, off of staff but God forbid you drive to school with an American flag on your truck because that definitely crosses the line.

We now live in a time where many people despise the American flag, even though we are in America. And because that is an incredibly dumb take, no one should treat these people seriously, given how objectively retarded they are. This is why students at Edmond North High School defied school officials after being told they were not allowed to fly the flag.
title: Remember that school district with the toe-licking videos? They just tried to ban the American Flag

description:

As we've seen over the past few weeks, our corporate journalisming overlords are more than happy to shill, carry water, and/or straight-up lie on behalf of Kamala Harris. Or if not on behalf of KamaLOLOLOLOLOLa, on behalf of the fact she's not Donald Trump.

Watch: Kamala Harris claims she had nothing to do with Bidenom
title: Kamala Harris HATES reporters, keeps a list of those who don't, and I quote, 'appreciate' her

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Kamala Harris's speech last night was... meh. I'm not angry or outraged. Just meh. It was everything I expected it to be: lies, lack of policies, and acknowledgment that she had anything to do with the past four years. You might argue she understood the assignment since the assignment is to pretend she didn't exist prior to meangirling Joe Biden out of the election.

Since the media is going to be working overtime to pretend she's never said or done anything ever, it's that much more important that we do. Like the time she endorsed Marxism THE DAY BEF
title: Kamala Harris Shares Video That Sounds Like an Endorsement of Marxism
